projects.name: Playgroundfinder
projects.description: Playground Finder is a React web app built with React Router and the Google Places API (NearbySearch and TextSearch). It allows users to search for playgrounds, view results on an interactive map, and save their favorite spots to a personal profile.

projects.name: Movie Library
projects.description: Movie Library is a React app where current and upcoming movies are displayed. The app uses React Router, allowing users to navigate between pages without reloading the site.

projects.name: Taskbuddy
projects.description: Taskbuddy is a React and TypeScript to-do app using Zustand for global state management, featuring task creation, live tracking of totals and completions, and task removal.

projects.name: Happy-thoughts API
projects.description: Happy Thoughts is a fullstack project featuring a RESTful API for managing posts and a React frontend for sharing and liking happy thoughts, with real-time updates and timestamps.
